value.0:
- Within the Blood and Bone -
Written by Mebrie'wiel


Chapter I
- Stars of the Night: Opening Remarks

I saw with my own eyes, how they bit their fangs through the soft skin of the poor adventurer's neck. Blood started to fall slowly to the snow, painting it red. I couldn't move, I couldn't scream. But I heard the last words, before the silence fell over the Frozen Wastes.
"Never forget, never remember". Yet I still dare to think what he ment with that.
My eyes filled with salty tears. Soon they would find myself, aswell. 
Once they had tasted the sweet, delicious blood after a long while without any drips if it, they would hunt until the last living creature is dead.
I looked up at the sky, muttering a prayer. Then I felt how something took a tight grap from my wrist wordlessy. I couldn't look at who even did it, since I was expecting it to be another vampire. More tears fell onto my cheeks.


Chapter II
- The Delusion

Celilith
